name: frompoints
title: Trajectory from Points
description: Converts a table containing points with timestamps into trajectories, where each row represents a complete trajectory.

inputs.name: input_geom_column
inputs.title: Geometry column
inputs.description: The name of the column storing the geometry (point)
inputs.helper: Your geometry column must contain single points only, not lines or polygons

inputs.name: input_tpoints_column
inputs.title: Trajectory points column name
inputs.description: Name to be assigned to the column containing the trajectory points

inputs.name: input_properties_columns
inputs.title: Properties columns
inputs.description: All the columns to be stored as a JSON-encoded string per timestamp
inputs.helper: The selected columns will be stored as properties in a JSON-encoded string for each point

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the transformed data
